      • promote

        public boolean promote(Square square,
                       PieceType pieceType)
        Promotes a pawn to a newer piece. Calls isValidPromotion function first
        Parameters:
        square - Promotion Square
        pieceType - The type of piece to promote to. If none is provided it defaults to Queen.
        Returns:
        boolean If the promotion was made

      • isValidPromotion

        public boolean isValidPromotion(Square square)
        Checks if the square contains a pawn that can be promoted.
        Parameters:
        square - Square of the pawn
        Returns:
        boolean If the pawn can be promoted

        Returns:

      • undoMove

        public void undoMove()
        This undoes the previous move.

      • getValidMoves

        public Square[] getValidMoves(Coordinate coordinate)
        This function returns all the valid moves a square/piece can make
        Parameters:
        coordinate - The coordinate of the piece/square.
        Returns:
        Square[] The array of possible squares.

      • getAttackingPieces

        public Square[] getAttackingPieces(PlayerType player)
        Returns the array of squares of the pieces that are attacking the King If no piece is attacking it then {null,null} is returned.
        Parameters:
        player - The player whose king is under attack
        Returns:
        Squares[] The array of squares of pieces that are attacking the King. Max Size of array is 2

      • move

        public boolean move(Coordinate initCoordinate,
                    Coordinate finalCoordinate)
        Makes a move from initial coordinate to final one. It calls isValidMove(),isValidCastling() and isValidEnpassant()
        Parameters:
        initCoordinate - Initial Coordinate
        finalCoordinate - Final Coordinate
        Returns:
        boolean If the move was made

      • isValidEnpassant

                                 Square s2)
        Checks if the move is valid enpassant move.
        Parameters:
        s1 - Initial Square
        s2 - Final Square
        Returns:
        boolean If enpassant valid

        Returns:

      • castle

        private void castle(Square kingSquare,
                    Square rookSquare)
        Makes a castle move.

        It calls the isValidCastling() first.

        Parameters:
        kingSquare - The square of the King
        rookSquare - The square of the Rook

      • isPathClear

        private boolean isPathClear(Coordinate[] path,
                            Coordinate initCoordinate,
                            Coordinate finalCoordinate)
        Checks if there are any obstacles between the pieces.
        Parameters:
        path - The path between the pieces
        initCoordinate - Initial Coordinate to ignore
        finalCoordinate - Final Coordinate to ignore
        Returns:
        boolean Is path clear

      • isValidMovement

        private boolean isValidMovement(Square initSquare,
                                Square finalSquare)
        Checks if the piece can make a valid movement to the square.
        Parameters:
        initSquare - Initial Square
        finalSquare - Final Square
        Returns:
        boolean If movement is valid

      • isValidMove

        public boolean isValidMove(Square initSquare,
                           Square finalSquare)
        Checks if the given move is valid and safe. Calls the isValidMovement() and moveMakesCheck().
        Parameters:
        initSquare - The initial Square
        finalSquare - The final Square
        Returns:
        boolean Whether move is valid
